transfer.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens to `to` address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens from `from` address to `to` address.

approve.description: Sets `spender` as the spender of `value` amount of tokens from the caller's account.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

nominatedOwner.description: Returns the address nominated as the new owner.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

setUseDELEGATECALL.description: Sets whether DELEGATECALL should be used.

nominateNewOwner.description: Nominates a new owner for the contract.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts the ownership of the contract.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given owner address.

_emit.description: Emits an event with specified topics and data.

OwnerNominated.description: Emitted when a new owner is nominated.

TargetUpdated.description: Emitted when the target address is updated.

Approval.description: Emitted when `spender` is approved to spend `value` tokens on behalf of `owner`.

Transfer.description: Emitted when `value` tokens are transferred from `from` to `to` address.
